Message:
I promised to teach
the cat-girl how to dance...

Her expressions are awkward,
and her legs—an entangled mess...
Is this girl really a cat?

But, no matter how
strict I was with her,

I liked her attitude and
taught her everything
she needed to be the bar’s
next poster girl.

I’m going to quit anyways,
so no one’ll care, right?

I wasn’t going to give up
on my dreams anymore.
